mapper.select: select a.WHNAME ,b.STOCK ,b.PK_SOBOOKS from base_warehouse as a left join base_stock as b on a.WAREHOUSE_ID = b.WAREHOUSE_ID where b.GOOD_ID=#{GOODCODE} and b.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0

select a.GOODNAME, a.GOODPIC,a.STOCKNUM,a.LASTPPRICE ,a.CUNIT_ID,a.FZUNIT_ID,b.STOCK from base_good as a left join base_stock as b on a.GOODCODE=b.GOOD_ID where now() >SUBDATE(b.LASTTIME,interval -#{pd.OVERDATE} day) and a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(b.DR,0)=0
select GOODNAME,GOODPIC,STOCKNUM,CUNIT_ID,FZUNIT_ID ,LASTPPRICE from base_good where PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and STOCKDOWNNUM > STOCKNUM and IFNULL(DR,0)=0
